author: gua00va
content: where shoud i learn about evm??

author: chfast
content: You only takes the number of inputs/outputs of the callee into account. In this case `CALLF` does not change the stack height therefore the section 0 max stack height is 1. But there is also runtime check at `CALLF` where the callee's max stack height is considered.

author: abcoathup
